name: Rampage Agents
description:
We are aiming to build Rampage Agents actually fitting our community's preferences.
Join our discord to talk to devs, or post in the Steam discussion.
Your feedbacks are gold to us!



Rampage Agents is a multi-player VR shooter. Players can choose agents with various abilities from an ever-expanding roster to engage in exciting battles. Team up with friends and engage in blood-pumping survival battles, or confront powerful enemies and fight one's way out.

  • Battle Royale mode: Create your tactic squad and utilize your hero skill, weapon and items to ensure your survival. Become the last one standing in the massive map.
  • Adventure mode: Fused with Roguelite elements and dynamic tactical options, you can play as different agents with different skill sets in procedurally-generated stages with random loots. Find the right weapon & chip combo and level up the skills to create a unique build among tens of thousands of possible combinations.




  • [Team Up and Engage in Innovative Battles]
Tactic Squad: Be it battle royales or adventure stages, choose your agent and team up with fellow players. With your unique abilities, cooperate with your friends and find new strategies, and create the ultimate team.




  • [Rich Content, Shooting with Style]
Gun Master: There are 35 weapons of 7 categories (Pistols, SMGs, Rifles, Shotguns, Snipers, Launchers, Flamethrowers) and over 100 unique items for you to get at random on your adventure.




  • [Gaming Together with Voice Chat]
Multi-player: You can form tactical squad and participate in battle royales, or go on adventure with up to three teammates. In multi-player mode, you can revive dying teammates.




  • [Bullet Hell, Adrenaline Rush]
Thrilling Combat: Choose from Heroes of various abilities, and combine them with different skill upgrades, weapons, and items to create unique builds. Each session is a brand-new experience.





  • [Exhilarating Battles Unlike Ever Before]
Boss Showdowns: There are four difficulties: Normal, Hard, Nightmare and Life-Risking. A higher difficulty level offers more challenging bosses, monster boosters, puzzles, and other mechanics that will put your mettle to the test.




  • [Come Back From Death As A Berserker]
Evolution: As a cyborg, you are never truly dead. Recycle the backup of your human brain and rebuild your body. Collect the Cores in battles to level up and empower yourself before setting out for another round!
